message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $90. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $130
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $110? That would be a much more comfortable price for me.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. I can sell it to you for $125
I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with $125. Can you do $115? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
